Title: Grace Period
Plot: When a weekend call to the NCIS tip line from an unknown source about possible terrorist activity results in the death of two agents sent into a trap, the NCIS team will have to find out who were the people responsible with the help from Agent Paula Cassidy, who holds herself responsible for the tragedy.
GuestStars: Jessica Steen, Scottie Thompson, Shaun Duke, Haaz Sleiman, Dominic Rains, Sasha Roiz, Jacory Gums, Susanna Thompson
